review: I purchased ChromeCast for use with Aereo as a small experiment. I just recently got a new apartment and was trying to save money by using Aereo as my go to Television source and using Chromecast to Cast my video. The idea is a fairly common one but it is not officially supported by Google as of yet. So while you are in fact able to do this by watching TV from Chrome using Aereo and then casting a tab it does not work perfectly. However, when using Chromecast supported apps the Chromecast works wonderfully. Netflix and Youtube are easy to use and controlling either from a pc, tablet, or smartphone is easy peasy. For $35 I think this is an absolute steal!
author: M. Norton
